content:
Anyone feel like taking this bug on? https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/google_fonts/issues/6 - can't use the module because the API now requires a key and there's no way to add a key.

Unable to use without a google API key 路 Issue #6 路 backdrop-contrib/google_fonts
Got this: "The list of Google Fonts could not be fetched. Verify that your server can connect the Google Servers (https://www.googleapis.com). Error: Bad Request" And found this issue in ...
I have now provided a PR for this.
